title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.19 - Reporting of foodborne disease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.19 - Reporting of foodborne disease

State Regulations

Any food service operator having actual or constructive knowledge of the occurrence of illness allegedly due to the consumption of food served at the establishment, shall report the same within 24 hours by telephone, telegram or in person to the permit-issuing official. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-2.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
